title: ban

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
hello,
i have received a 14-days suspension for intensional feeding
i kinda deserve it
but before you doing that you should know what happened
game started i went to my lane lee sin (who reported me) was in jungle waiting when enemy team ganked him 
i came late and save him with heal 
he came back to my lane and started farming minions i pinged him he did not response i told him i would go and feed if he did not stop and yet no response
i did not want to play that game with him
i could not surrender so i started to walk to the enemy turret and get executed
 lol community is so toxic i always deal with people like lee sin and stay calm
i guess i don't deserve this much ban 
but you know better
thank you ..

replies.body: Even though it sounds like your teammates weren't quite willing to cooperate with your strategies and suggestions, intentionally feeding isn't necessarily the best way to respond. It can not only ruin the game for your team, but it can also upset the enemy team as well since they can no longer play a normal game.
